languages.text: {n}Великан усмехается.{/n} "Как я жажду узреть момент, когда ты сорвешь с себя маску {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}"героя Империума"{/d}, обнажив свое истинное могущество. Твоя доблестная репутация сделает твое предательство особенно горьким и нежданным для слуг трупа на троне. Но не переживай — на смену твоей прежней славе придет иная, более подобающая чемпиону".

{n}Uralon bares his teeth.{/n} "How I long to see the moment when you cast off your mask as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}'hero of the Imperium'{/d} and let your true power show. Your redoubtable reputation will make your betrayal all the more bitter and unexpected to the corpse emperor's servants. Do not lament the loss of your former renown, for a different kind will take its place, one more befitting a champion."
languages.original_text: {n}Великан усмехается.{/n} "Как я жажду узреть момент, когда ты сорвешь с себя маску {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}"героя Империума"{/d}, обнажив свое истинное могущество. Твоя доблестная репутация сделает твое предательство особенно горьким и нежданным для слуг трупа на троне. Но не переживай — на смену твоей прежней славе придет иная, более подобающая чемпиону".

traits.locale_text: {n}Uralon bares his teeth.{/n} "How I wait to see the moment when you will cast off your mask of a 'hero of the Imperium' and let your true power show. Your redoubtable reputation will make your betrayal all the more bitter and unexpected to the corpse emperor's servants. Do not lament your renown, for another will come in its place, one that is more befitting a champion."

Your redoubtable reputation will make your betrayal all the more bitter and unexpected to the corpse emperor's servants. Do not lament your renown, for another will come in its place, one that is more befitting a champion."

Your redoubtable reputation will make your betrayal all the more bitter and unexpected to the corpse emperor's servants. Do not lament the loss of your former renown, for a different kind will take its place, one more befitting a champion."

languages.text: {n}乌拉隆露出而笑。{/n}“我渴望看到你摘下‘{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}帝国英雄{/d}’的面具，展现你真正力量的那一刻。你令人敬畏的名声，只会让你的背叛更加令人震惊不已，让尸皇的仆人更加始料不及。不要为失去昔日的名望而悲叹，因为你将会获得新的威望，更加符合身为勇士之人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon bares his teeth.{/n} "How I long to see the moment when you cast off your mask as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}'hero of the Imperium'{/d} and let your true power show. Your redoubtable reputation will make your betrayal all the more bitter and unexpected to the corpse emperor's servants. Do not lament the loss of your former renown, for a different kind will take its place, one more befitting a champion."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌拉隆露出而笑。{/n}“我渴望看到你摘下‘帝国英雄’的面具，展现你真正力量的那一刻。你令人敬畏的名声，只会让你的背叛更加令人震惊不已，让尸皇的仆人更加始料不及。不要为失去昔日的名望而悲叹，因为你将会获得新的威望，更加符合身为勇士之人。”

languages.text: {n}Uralon fletscht die Zähne.{/n} "Wie ich mich nach dem Augenblick sehen, in dem Ihr Eure Maske als {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}'{mf|Held|Heldin} des Imperiums'{/d} ablegt und Eure wahre Macht offenbart. Euer makelloser Ruf wird Euren Verrat für die Diener des Leichenimperators umso bitterer und unerwarteter machen. Trauert nicht über den Verlust Eures einstigen Ansehens, denn ein anderes Ansehen wird seinen Platz einnehmen. Eines, das {mf|eines Herrschers|einer Herrscherin} würdig ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon bares his teeth.{/n} "How I long to see the moment when you cast off your mask as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}'hero of the Imperium'{/d} and let your true power show. Your redoubtable reputation will make your betrayal all the more bitter and unexpected to the corpse emperor's servants. Do not lament the loss of your former renown, for a different kind will take its place, one more befitting a champion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Uralon fletscht die Zähne.{/n} "Wie ich mich nach dem Augenblick sehen, in dem Ihr Eure Maske als '{mf|Held|Heldin} des Imperiums' ablegt und Eure wahre Macht offenbart. Euer makelloser Ruf wird Euren Verrat für die Diener des Leichenimperators umso bitterer und unerwarteter machen. Trauert nicht über den Verlust Eures einstigen Ansehens, denn ein anderes Ansehen wird seinen Platz einnehmen. Eines, das {mf|eines Herrschers|einer Herrscherin} würdig ist."

languages.text: {n}La bouche d'Uralon s'étire en un rictus.{/n} « Comme j'ai hâte de vous voir retirer ce masque {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}{mf|de "héros|d'"héroïne} de l'Imperium"{/d} et faire étalage de votre véritable puissance. Pour les serviteurs de l'Empereur-Cadavre qui connaissent votre réputation, votre trahison n'en sera que plus amère et inattendue. Ne pleurez pas votre renommée passée, car vous vous en forgerez une nouvelle, digne d'{mf|un|une} véritable {mf|champion|championne}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon bares his teeth.{/n} "How I long to see the moment when you cast off your mask as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}'hero of the Imperium'{/d} and let your true power show. Your redoubtable reputation will make your betrayal all the more bitter and unexpected to the corpse emperor's servants. Do not lament the loss of your former renown, for a different kind will take its place, one more befitting a champion."

traits.locale_text: {n}La bouche d'Uralon s'étire en un rictus.{/n} « Comme j'ai hâte de vous voir retirer ce masque {mf|de "héros|d'"héroïne} de l'Imperium" et faire étalage de votre véritable puissance. Pour les serviteurs de l'Empereur-Cadavre qui connaissent votre réputation, votre trahison n'en sera que plus amère et inattendue. Ne pleurez pas votre renommée passée, car vous vous en forgerez une nouvelle, digne d'{mf|un|une} véritable {mf|champion|championne}. »

languages.text: {n}Uralon enseña los dientes.{/n} «Cómo ansío el momento en el que te despojarás de tu máscara de {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}"h{mf|éroe|eroína} del Imperium"{/d} y revelarás tu verdadero poder. Tu intachable reputación hará que tu traición resulte aún más amarga e inesperada para los súbditos del emperador cadáver. No lamentes la pérdida de tu anterior renombre, pues alcanzarás cotas aún mayores como camp{mf|eón|eona}».
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon bares his teeth.{/n} "How I long to see the moment when you cast off your mask as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}'hero of the Imperium'{/d} and let your true power show. Your redoubtable reputation will make your betrayal all the more bitter and unexpected to the corpse emperor's servants. Do not lament the loss of your former renown, for a different kind will take its place, one more befitting a champion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Uralon enseña los dientes.{/n} «Cómo ansío el momento en el que te despojarás de tu máscara de "h{mf|éroe|eroína} del Imperium" y revelarás tu verdadero poder. Tu intachable reputación hará que tu traición resulte aún más amarga e inesperada para los súbditos del emperador cadáver. No lamentes la pérdida de tu anterior renombre, pues alcanzarás cotas aún mayores como camp{mf|eón|eona}».

languages.text: {n}ウラロンが歯をむき出す。{/n}「お前が『{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}帝国の英雄{/d}』の仮面を脱ぎ捨て、真の力を発揮する瞬間をどれほど見たかったことか。お前のその立派な名声を信じ切ってる死体の皇帝の手下たちにとって、その裏切りは予想以上に辛辣なものになるだろう。過去の名声が失われても嘆くことはない。戦士にふさわしい、別の名誉がそれに取って代わるのだからな」
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon bares his teeth.{/n} "How I long to see the moment when you cast off your mask as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}'hero of the Imperium'{/d} and let your true power show. Your redoubtable reputation will make your betrayal all the more bitter and unexpected to the corpse emperor's servants. Do not lament the loss of your former renown, for a different kind will take its place, one more befitting a champion."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウラロンが歯をむき出す。{/n}「お前が『{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}帝国の英雄{/d}』の仮面を脱ぎ捨て、真の力を発揮する瞬間をどれほど見たかったことか。お前のその立派な名声を信じ切ってる死体の皇帝の手下たちにとって、その裏切りは予想以上に辛辣なものになるだろう。過去の名声が失われても嘆くことはない。戦士にふさわしい、別の名誉がそれに取って代わるのだからな」

languages.text: {n}Uralon sırıtıyor.{/n} "Şu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}'İmparatorluk kahramanı'{/d} havalarını bırakıp da gerçek kudretini göstereceğin günleri dört gözle bekliyorum. İhanetin, sarsılmaz itibarın sayesinde ceset imparatorun hizmetkârlarına çok daha acı ve ani gelecektir. Eski şanını kaybettiğine üzülmeyesin. Daha başka, müdafiye yaraşır bir şanın olacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon bares his teeth.{/n} "How I long to see the moment when you cast off your mask as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}'hero of the Imperium'{/d} and let your true power show. Your redoubtable reputation will make your betrayal all the more bitter and unexpected to the corpse emperor's servants. Do not lament the loss of your former renown, for a different kind will take its place, one more befitting a champion."
